version_description:
Here’s what's new:

* One-time phone verification to keep your account more secure
* Top up confirmation to prevent accidental top ups
* Clearer error messaging so you can fix problems faster
* Minor bug fixes

Here’s what's new:

* One-time phone verification to keep your account more secure
* Top up confirmation to prevent accidental top ups
* Clearer error messaging so you can fix problems faster
* Minor bug fixes

Thanks for using the 7-Eleven Fuel App!  We regularly update the app to make it better and more reliable for you.  Get the latest version to make sure you have all the new features and best experience available.

We’ve made it even easier to lock in your best local fuel price at 7-Eleven! You now no longer need to have funds on your digital gift card to lock in a fuel price - simply search for your best local price, lock it in and then head in to your nearest stor

We’ve made it even easier to lock in your best local fuel price at 7-Eleven! You now no longer need to have funds on your digital gift card to lock in a fuel price - simply search for your best local price, lock it in and then head in to your nearest stor

We’ve made it even easier for you to lock in your best local fuel price and redeem exclusive deals with just the one scan through our new My Card and improved design.

What’s new in this release:
- New ‘My Card’ feature – redeem Fuel Price

We’ve made it even easier for you to lock in your best local fuel price and redeem exclusive deals with just the one scan through our new My Card and improved design.

What’s new in this release:
- New ‘My Card’ feature – redeem Fuel Price
Enhancements to the contact us form enabling the capture of additional customer details to improve feedback response.
Enhancements to the contact us form enabling the capture of additional customer details to improve feedback response.
Fuel Price Lock has been updated to show how much you saved on your tank fill at 7-Eleven by locking in our best local Fuel Price. You can now also Rate the App.
Fuel Price Lock has been updated to show how much you saved on your tank fill at 7-Eleven by locking in our best local Fuel Price. You can now also Rate the App.
With the new loyalty feature you'll enjoy a Reward on 7th visit, simply scan your My Card each time you spend in-store, after 6 visits you'll be presented with a choice of rewards to select one from.
With the new loyalty feature you'll enjoy a Reward on 7th visit, simply scan your My Card each time you spend in-store, after 6 visits you'll be presented with a choice of rewards to select one from.

The 7-Eleven Store Locator is back! This feature can be found under settings and will enable you to search for your nearest 7-Eleven store and for stores with fuel, see the current Mobil fuel prices. You can also see the services offered in each store.
